mapper.select: SELECT u.id ,u.username ,password ,name ,phone ,enabled ,created_at ,updated_at ,auth FROM user u LEFT OUTER JOIN user_auth auth ON u.username = auth.username WHERE u.username = #{username}
SELECT u.id ,u.username ,password ,name ,phone ,enabled ,created_at ,updated_at ,auth FROM user u LEFT OUTER JOIN user_auth auth ON u.username = auth.username WHERE u.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( id, username, password, name, email, profile ) VALUES ( UUID(), #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{profile} )
INSERT INTO user_auth( id, username, auth ) VALUES ( UUID(), #{username}, #{auth} )
